title: FS: Baseball trade cards (Tobin litho, Sporting Life)
author: trdcrdkid

posts.post_title: FS: Baseball trade cards (Tobin litho, Sporting Life)
posts.post_content:
1887 Tobin Lithograph card of Jim McCormick (A Slide For Home) with Tansill's Punch ad overprint. Trimmed on top and bottom edges. Blank back has scrapbook paper. $130 obo. SOLD

Two 1887 Sporting Life trade cards (H804-8B):
Judgement (trimmed). $50 SOLD
Ain't This A Daisy? (trimmed at top). $75 SOLD

Prices are shipped. PPFF preferred, but I'm flexible. PM with questions.

[IMG]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/53153795824_51925a77d5_b.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/53154027145_2852b16916_b.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/53153795849_196b696fdb_b.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/53154084003_11f6aa98de_b.jpg[/IMG]
Any interest in these? Offers welcome.

[quote name="GM1" post=2371085]$40 shipped FF on Judgment?[/QUOTE]

PM sent.
Prices lowered on the Tobin Lithograph McCormick and the remaining Sporting Life card.
